section.p: You are deep in the western steppes and night is falling. To the west, you see something glitter on the horizon - the Rimewater. To the south, the mountains of the Spine of Harkun rise up heavenwards.

You are not far enough north for the cold to be a serious problem, but you still need to hunt for food. .
If you succeed, you bring down a mountain goat to eat.
If you fail, you go hungry and must lose 1 Stamint point.
If you still live, in the morning you set off.

choices.choice: Climb the mountains to the south
